summary: Four very different college girls drive to Fort Lauderdale, Florida for spring break and seek out various adventures and romance for themselves.
cast: Dolores Hart|George Hamilton|Yvette Mimieux|Jim Hutton|Barbara Nichols|Paula Prentiss|Chill Wills|Frank Gorshin|Rory Harrity|Ted Berger|John Brennan|Connie Francis|Carol Byron|John Cliff|Oliver Cross|Jack Deery|Amy Douglass|Dennis Durney|John Durren|Tom Ferrandini|Bess Flowers|Sean Flynn|Robert Foulk|Paul Frees|Kenneth Gibson|Percy Helton|Jack Kruschen|Jon Lormer|Jerry Madison|Bob Markley|Patricia Marlowe|Owen McGiveney|Harold Miller|Garry Murray|Monty O'Grady|Mary Patton|Ted Perritt|Maggie Pierce|Leoda Richards|Michael Rougas|Paul Russell|Marlo Ryan|Vito Scotti|Chris Seitz|Norman Stevans|Bert Stevens|Dean Stewart|Tony Tarantino|Larry Thor|Arthur Tovey|Ken Wales|Robert Woods
title: Playas de Florida
